Steps.StepString: Aimed to exploit a potential Insecure Direct Object Reference (IDOR) vulnerability in a web application
Manipulated the file identifier parameter in the URL to reflect other file identifiers, including those that should not have been accessible
Submitted the modified URL in the web application to test for an IDOR vulnerability
Upon successful retrieval of a restricted file, the presence of an IDOR vulnerability was confirmed
Enumerated various file identifiers within the web application in an attempt to find the one associated with the flag file
Submitted a URL crafted to include the file identifier associated with the flag file
Retrieved the content of the flag file through the web application, yielding the flag needed to complete the challenge
